name: Sundrift
description:
The Empire is on its way to destroy your galaxy !!! You must save as many planets as you can before it's too late.

 Use the mass of your sun to put them on a safe orbit and drift away.

This game uses only a mouse !

Pressed Left Click : Aim & Power Release

 Left Click : Impulse

 A game made by Drekasyni & Cromnir using Godot Engine
